title: How to Make Meat Jun

steps.headline: Prepare the different bowls.
steps.description: Make the marinade. In a large bowl, combine the soy sauce, garlic, sugar, and water. Add a good cup of flour or two to a large plate. Beat the eggs in a large bowl and set aside.

steps.headline: Add the meat to the marinade.
steps.description: Fold the meat lightly into the ingredients to give a thorough soaking.

steps.headline: Transfer the meat to the flour.
steps.description: Cover the meat thoroughly with the flour and lightly shake the excess off.

steps.headline: Dip the meat into the egg bowl.
Pan fry the meat.
steps.description: Add a few tablespoons of canola oil to a large frying pan and place it over medium heat. Allow the meat and eggs to cook for a few minutes on both sides.

steps.headline: Drain the meat jun.
steps.description: Transfer the meat onto paper towels to remove any excess fat and grease.

steps.headline: Make the dipping sauce.
steps.description: Combine the dipping sauce ingredients into a small bowl.

steps.headline: Serve the meat jun.
steps.description: Slice it into ⁄2 inch (1.3 cm) strips and serve with the sauce. Meat jun is commonly served with a side bowl of white steamed rice.
